title: Herbal Body Butter (Shea + Amla)
excerpt: A deeply nourishing body butter with shea, coconut oil, and amla infusion for dry Vata skin.
content:
## What Is This Herbal Body Butter?
A rich, creamy moisturizer made with shea butter, coconut oil, amla infusion, and vitamin E. Designed to nourish dry, Vata-type skin and restore softness.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Amla provides antioxidant support, shea butter offers deep moisture, and coconut oil cools and soothes aggravated Pitta.

### Key Benefits
- Deep hydration for dry skin.
- Supports elasticity and smoothness.
- Provides natural antioxidant nourishment.

## Ingredients
- Shea butter
- Coconut oil
- Amla oil infusion
- Vitamin E

## Usage Instructions
- Apply generously after shower on slightly damp skin.

## Packaging
- Jar with spatula for hygienic application.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch-test if sensitive. Avoid open cuts.

## Why Choose This Butter?
A luxurious, nutrient-rich Ayurvedic formula for dry, stressed, or rough skin.
